QuestData.Title: Suspiciously Spiced Steak
QuestData.Description:
My sister's idea is charming, but Theramus needs a real pick-me-up.
That would be a generous serving of sourbloom. We can make it into a paste to slather onto his favorite food: turtle meat!
Will you help me collect the ingredients?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Perfectly Tender Turtle Meat, $2oa Reptilian Eggshells, and $3oa Sourbloom.
QuestData.RewardText: The meat to sourbloom ratio is just right.
